title: Verify: Implement Execution History and Diff View
description:
Run automated tests for task T-065.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement storage and retrieval of full execution trace per run, including input/output, timing, errors. Add diff view between runs and re-run with modified inputs.
Criteria:
- Execution trace stored for every run
- Diff view available between runs
- Re-run with modified inputs works
acceptance_criteria: Execution trace stored for every run
